name: YOUR OWN VOMIT
description:
YOUR OWN VOMIT is a short Twine game that explores a single night of drunken disassociation, churning through personal vignettes triggered by slight turns of phrase or sudden moments. I made this between 2014 and 2015 as a way of dealing with my changing sense of identity, gender, and understanding of what it means to be alone. 

This is a very personal project, and I'd appreciate it if you could kick a dollar or two my way. Thank you!
